import { Meta } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/ViewTabSearchTemplate" />

# Default View Search Template Factory

```jsx
const DefaultViewTabSearchTemplateFactory = props => {
	const {Component = SearchTemplate, children, ...otherProps} = props;

	const QuickSearchComponent = R.compose(
		withQuickSearchCriteriaFields,
		withQuickSearchCategories
	)(QuickSearch);

	const ComposedComponent = R.compose(withSearchTemplateFormState)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedComponent {...otherProps}
		                   disablePin
		                   disableRecentHistory
		                   QuickSearchComponent={QuickSearchComponent}>
			{children}
		</ComposedComponent>
	);
};
```
